page.title: 06 WOODLARKS
page.content: Woodlarks is situated between Lodge Hill Road and Tilford Road. It is in two parts The Woodlarks Campsite and The Woodlarks Workshops.Both were founded by Lt. Col.& Mrs Strover. The campsite covers 12 acres of pine woods and grassland and here groups of physically handicapped people come to enjoy a weeks holiday from mid May to mid September.Groups come from all over this country and some from abroad. Each group brings its own camp leader and helpers.The majority sleep in tents,but there is a dormitory available.Meals are usually cooked on an open wood fire and eaten outside. There is a specially designed heated swimming pool which is always popular. Adjoining the site is Woodlarks Workshops which accomodates and offers work to 18 handicapped women.They make toys,etc. which are sold in the shop.
